title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 437.5 - Program requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 437.5 - Program requirements

State Regulations

The City of New York will provide a four-week training course
in fire supervision to each applicant. Such course shall provide, at a minimum, the courses prescribed for Supervisory Level I training as described in section
426.9
(b)(3)
of
this Title. A detailed outline of the actual curriculum will be made available
to each trainee and his employer prior to commencement of the
course. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
437.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
